name: Feed The Monster
overview: In Feed The Monster we control a little alien monster called Quoru. After passing through the earth, Quoru's saucer is shot down. Upon receiving the strong impact, an energy sphere detaches from the ship and ends up in the hands of a terrible monster. In order to recover his energy sphere and be able to return home, Quoru will have to feed the Monster. Game developed for the Game Boy Compo 2023.
